he's willing to talk with us

at their nearby store, they prepare to open for their first day of business since the war

extent.charseq: i'm proud of him, says this former traffic cop

ldc_scope.charseq: we call him mr. aziz, and i'm proud of him, says this former traffic cop
across town in a less affluent neighborhood, reactions to aziz's arrest are profoundly different
as he explains how his father negotiated his surrender
he says his father's night-time handover was dignified, that u.s. forces offered medical support for his father's heart condition, that has caused two heart attacks recently
aziz is a war criminal says ahmed

extent.charseq: he should get the death penalty

ldc_scope.charseq: he should get the death penalty, just like saddam, 60 times over

extent.charseq: we give mr. bush six months to get things right he says, going on to explain, if not, we will fight the americans
